price: 44. (mereka Kami utus) dengan membawa keterangan-keterangan (mukjizat) dan kitab-kitab. Dan Kami turunkan Aż-Żikr (Al-Qur`ān) kepadamu, agar engkau menerangkan kepada manusia apa yang telah diturunkan kepada mereka*(455) dan agar mereka memikirkan,
arabic: بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلزُّبُرِۗ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: *455). Yakni perintah, larangan, aturan dan lain-lain yang terdapat dalam Al-Qur`ān.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: bil-bayināti wal-zuburi wa-anzalnā ilayka al-dhik'ra litubayyina lilnnāsi mā nuzzila ilayhim walaʿallahum yatafakkarūna
